statalign.base
Class Mcmc

java.lang.Object
  statalign.base.thread.Stoppable
      statalign.base.Mcmc

public class Mcmc
extends Stoppable

This class hadles an MCMC run. The class extends Stoppable, so it is possible to terminate in graphical mode.

Author:
miklos, novak

Field Summary
 boolean burnin
          True while the MCMC is in the burn-in phase.
 MCMCPars mcmcpars
          These are the parameters, containing the number of burn-in steps, the total number of steps in the MCMC and the sampling rate.
 PostprocessManager postprocMan
          This is the PostprocessManager that handles the postprocesses analyzing the MCMC run.
 Tree tree
          This is the current tree of the MCMC run

Method Detail

doMCMC

public void doMCMC()
Actually does an MCMC run. It performs first a prescribed number of burn-in steps, then makes the prescribed number of steps after burnin, making samples in the prescribes frequency. It also calls the appropriate functions of the PostpocessManager postprocMan, to handle properly the prescribed postprocessing protocols

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
This function is only for testing and debugging purposes.

Parameters:
args - Actually, we do not use these parameters, as this function is for testing and debugging purposes. All necessary input data is directly written into the function.
